name: PokéZoo
description:
PokéZoo is a cross-breeding strategy game inspired by PolyMars's CyberZoo...

  • Buy Eggs with PokéCoins.
  • Hatch them into random baby Pokémons.
  • Evolve them or fuse them with other Pokémons.
  • Each Pokémon has a value based on its rarity, level and stage which increases every 10 seconds.
  • You can sell these Pokémons and earn PokéCoins to buy more eggs.
  • Earn as many PokéCoins you can and fuse 'em all! ;)

Currently PokéZoo only has 6 Pokémons including their evolution stages and fusions... 
(Pichu, Togepi, Magby, Azurill, Budew and Riolu)....
More may be added soon so stay tuned!!!

All fusions generated using https://japeal.com/pkm/

This game is made with Godot Game Engine
